summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Seattle Municipal Code Subsections 20.04.130B and .200A (Ordinance 109729, Sections 7 and 14 respectively) to revise the penalty upon certain delinquent assessments and to conform with RCW 35.45.150, and SMC Section 20.12.040 and .080 (Ordinance 102560, Sections 4 and 8) to provide for the filing and recording of agreements to defer local improvement assessments.
